articles.title: WHO calls for pressing action to contain monkeypox risk in Europe - Prensa Latina
articles.description: Moscow, Jul 2 (Prensa Latina) The WHO representative in Russia, Melita Vujnovic, on Saturday warned the risk of monkeypox spread across Europe is too high due to outbreaks reported in new regional nations.

articles.title: Monkeypox cases triple in Europe, WHO says - 9News
articles.description: And African health authorities said they are treating the expanding monkeypox outbreak as an emergency, calling on rich countries to share limited supplies of vaccines to avoid equity problems seen during the COVID-19 pandemic.
